childMarkdownRemark.html:
Welcome to my website,

My name is Jasper van Rijbroek, a professional (senior) developer, hobbist home automator, cyclist and father.

I have been into programming right when I left school, which was about 2010. After studying system administration I decided development was way more fun and ended up where I am now.

When I blog I blog about things I find interesting in my life or which I think is worth mentioning.

Currently my interests lay in Smart Home, Gatsby, Gaming and Servers.
